rows.label: qst102701_msg001
rows.name:
I want medicine for my
grandpa's illness (temp)

rows.label: qst102701_msg002
rows.name: Please find a skilled doctor (temp)

rows.label: qst102701_msg101
rows.name: Did you find a doctor? (temp)

rows.label: qst102701_msg201
rows.name: I'm so glad you found one (temp)

rows.label: qst102701_msg202
rows.name:
I hope they can make
some good medicine.

rows.label: qst102701_msg301
rows.name:
You brought the medicine!
Thank you! (temp)

rows.label: qst102701_msg302
rows.name: I'll take it to my grandpa! (temp)

rows.label: qst102701_msg0001
rows.name: Grandpa seems to be in a lot of pain...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0002
rows.name: He's gotten worse than before...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0003
rows.name: Is Grandpa going to die?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0004
rows.name:
I believe he said the problem
was with his ether flow.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0005
rows.name:
Using my power as the Master
Blade, I might be able to
at least regulate it.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0006
rows.name: Really? You can heal Grandpa?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0007
rows.name:
Not completely... He's
a Man-Eater, isn't he?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0008
rows.name:
There's nothing I can do
for his human parts.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0009
rows.name:
Then we'll try to find
a skilled doctor.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0010
rows.name: Thank you! ...Um...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0011
rows.name: Please don't tell Grandpa about this.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0012
rows.name:
If the doctor can't help him,
it'll just get his hopes up...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't look so sad! Rex will
figure something out.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0014
rows.name: Yeah! I promise.
